verses.verse: And there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4397>angels<s%> to <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> at <S%H6153>even;<s%> and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom:<s%> and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H7200>seeing<s%> them <S%H6965>rose<s%> up to <S%H7125>meet<s%> them; and he <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself with his <S%H639>face<s%> toward the <S%H776>ground;<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> my <S%H113>lords,<s%> <S%H5493>turn<s%> in, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H413>into<s%> your <S%H5650>servant's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H3885>tarry<s%> <S%H3885>all<s%> night, and <S%H7364>wash<s%> your <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and you shall <S%H7925>rise<s%> up <S%H7925>early,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> on your <S%H1870>ways.<s%> And they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>No;<s%> but we will <S%H3885>abide<s%> in the <S%H7339>street<s%> <S%H3885>all<s%> night.

And he <S%H6484>pressed<s%> on them <S%H3966>greatly;<s%> and they <S%H5493>turned<s%> in to him, and <S%H935>entered<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> his <S%H1004>house;<s%> and he <S%H6213>made<s%> them a <S%H4960>feast,<s%> and did <S%H644>bake<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread, and they did <S%H398>eat.<s%>

But <S%H2962>before<s%> they <S%H7901>lay<s%> down, the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> even the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> <S%H5437>compassed<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5921>round,<s%> both <S%H2205>old<s%> and <S%H5288>young,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> from every <S%H7098>quarter:<s%>

And they <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H3876>Lot,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H346>Where<s%> are the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> in to you this <S%H3915>night?<s%> <S%H3318>bring<s%> them out to us, that we may <S%H3045>know<s%> them.
And <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out at the <S%H6607>door<s%> to them, and <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him,
And <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H251>brothers,<s%> do not so <S%H7489>wickedly.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> I have <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have not <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H376>man;<s%> let me, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H3318>bring<s%> them out to you, and <S%H6213>do<s%> you to them as is <S%H2896>good<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>nothing;<s%> <S%H1697><s%> for <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H935>came<s%> they under the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of my <S%H6982>roof.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5066>Stand<s%> <S%H1973>back.<s%> And they <S%H559>said<s%> again, This <S%H259>one<s%> fellow <S%H935>came<s%> in to <S%H1481>sojourn,<s%> and he will <S%H8199>needs<s%> be a <S%H8199>judge:<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> will we deal <S%H7489>worse<s%> with you, than with them. And they <S%H6484>pressed<s%> <S%H3966>sore<s%> on the <S%H376>man,<s%> even <S%H3876>Lot,<s%> and <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H1817>door.<s%>

But the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7971>put<s%> <S%H7971>forth<s%> their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H935>pulled<s%> <S%H3876>Lot<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> to them, and <S%H5462>shut<s%> to the <S%H1817>door.<s%>

And they <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> that were at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H5575>blindness,<s%> both <S%H6996>small<s%> and <S%H1419>great:<s%> so that they <S%H3811>wearied<s%> themselves to <S%H4672>find<s%> the <S%H6607>door.<s%>

And the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3876>Lot,<s%> Have you <S%H6311>here<s%> <S%H4310>any<s%> <S%H5750>besides?<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> in <S%H2859>law,<s%> and your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> you have in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H3318>bring<s%> them out of this <S%H4725>place:<s%>

For we will <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of them is waxen <S%H1431>great<s%> <S%H854>before<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> us to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> it.

And <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out, and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to his <S%H2860>sons<s%> in <S%H2859>law,<s%> which <S%H3947>married<s%> his <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Up, <S%H3318>get<s%> you out of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7843>destroy<s%> this <S%H5892>city.<s%> But he <S%H1961>seemed<s%> <S%H5869><s%> as one that <S%H6711>mocked<s%> to his <S%H2860>sons<s%> in <S%H2859>law.<s%>

And <S%H3644>when<s%> the <S%H7837>morning<s%> <S%H5927>arose,<s%> then the <S%H4397>angels<s%> <S%H213>hastened<s%> <S%H3876>Lot,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H802>wife,<s%> and your <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> which are <S%H4672>here;<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> you be <S%H5595>consumed<s%> in the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And while he <S%H4102>lingered,<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> laid <S%H2388>hold<s%> on his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and on the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and on the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> being <S%H2551>merciful<s%> to him: and they <S%H3318>brought<s%> him <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H3240>set<s%> him <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when they had <S%H3318>brought<s%> them <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2351>abroad,<s%> that he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4422>Escape<s%> for your <S%H5315>life;<s%> <S%H5027>look<s%> not <S%H310>behind<s%> you, <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H5975>stay<s%> you in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3603>plain;<s%> <S%H4422>escape<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> you be <S%H5595>consumed.<s%>
And <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4994>Oh,<s%> not so, my <S%H113>LORD:<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> has <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> and you have <S%H1431>magnified<s%> your <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H6213>showed<s%> to me in <S%H2421>saving<s%> my <S%H5315>life;<s%> and I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H4422>escape<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> some <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1692>take<s%> me, and I <S%H4191>die:<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H5127>flee<s%> to, and it is a <S%H4705>little<s%> one: <S%H4994>Oh,<s%> let me <S%H4422>escape<s%> <S%H8033>thither,<s%> (is it not a <S%H4705>little<s%> one?) and my <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H2421>live.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2009>See,<s%> I have <S%H5375>accepted<s%> you concerning <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> that I will not <S%H2015>overthrow<s%> this <S%H5892>city,<s%> for the <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

<S%H4116>Haste<s%> you, <S%H4422>escape<s%> <S%H8033>thither;<s%> for I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H1697>anything<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> you be <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H8033>thither.<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H6820>Zoar.<s%>
The <S%H8121>sun<s%> was <S%H3318>risen<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> when <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into <S%H6820>Zoar.<s%>
Then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4305>rained<s%> on <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and on <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%> <S%H1614>brimstone<s%> and <S%H784>fire<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> out of <S%H8064>heaven;<s%>

And he <S%H2015>overthrew<s%> <S%H411>those<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3603>plain,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and that which <S%H6780>grew<s%> on the <S%H127>ground.<s%>
But his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H5027>looked<s%> back from <S%H310>behind<s%> him, and she <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H5333>pillar<s%> of <S%H4417>salt.<s%>
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> got up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> he <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H854>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>

And he <S%H8259>looked<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah,<s%> and <S%H5921>toward<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3603>plain,<s%> and <S%H7200>beheld,<s%> and, <S%H2009>see,<s%> the <S%H7008>smoke<s%> of the <S%H776>country<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up as the <S%H7008>smoke<s%> of a <S%H3536>furnace.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3603>plain,<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3876>Lot<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H2018>overthrow,<s%> when he <S%H2015>overthrew<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H2004><s%> <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled.<s%>

And <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up out of <S%H6820>Zoar,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%> with him; for he <S%H3372>feared<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H6820>Zoar:<s%> and he <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in a <S%H4631>cave,<s%> he and his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

And the <S%H1067>firstborn<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H6810>younger,<s%> Our <S%H1>father<s%> is <S%H2204>old,<s%> and there is not a <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> in to us after the <S%H1870>manner<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%>

<S%H3212>Come,<s%> let us make our <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and we will <S%H7901>lie<s%> with him, that we may <S%H2421>preserve<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> of our <S%H1>father.<s%>

And they made their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> that <S%H3915>night:<s%> and the <S%H1067>firstborn<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in, and <S%H7901>lay<s%> with her <S%H1>father;<s%> and he <S%H3045>perceived<s%> not when she <S%H7901>lay<s%> down, nor when she <S%H6965>arose.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass on the <S%H4283>morrow,<s%> that the <S%H1067>firstborn<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H6810>younger,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I <S%H7901>lay<s%> last <S%H570>night<s%> with my <S%H1>father:<s%> let us make him <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> this <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H1571>also;<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> you in, and <S%H7901>lie<s%> with him, that we may <S%H2421>preserve<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> of our <S%H1>father.<s%>

And they made their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> that <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H1571>also:<s%> and the <S%H6810>younger<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H7901>lay<s%> with him; and he <S%H3045>perceived<s%> not when she <S%H7901>lay<s%> down, nor when she <S%H6965>arose.<s%>
Thus were <S%H8147>both<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot<s%> with <S%H2029>child<s%> by their <S%H1>father.<s%>

And the first <S%H1067>born<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H4124>Moab:<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> is the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H4124>Moabites<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And the <S%H6810>younger,<s%> she also <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1151>Benammi:<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> is the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
